# dlc-cssterminal-block



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                              | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `command` | `command` | (optional) The command to display in the block (e.g. ls)                                                                                                                                 | `string` | `undefined` |
| `delay`   | `delay`   | (optional) The delay that should last the result to appear (e.g. 14)                                                                                                                     | `number` | `0`         |
| `result`  | `result`  | (optional) The result to display in the block (e.g. Desktop Documents Downloads Pictures Videos)                                                                                         | `string` | `undefined` |
| `shell`   | `shell`   | (optional) The shell to display in the block (e.g. ~ user$) This overrides the shell specified in the dlc-cssterminal component                                                          | `string` | `undefined` |
| `words`   | `words`   | (optional) The number of words to take into account to calculate the command text block width. This is useful when the calculation is not very accurate, so you can accurate it yourself | `number` | `undefined` |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
